title: Ingestion that doesn’t give you indigestion
abstract: Getting data into MarkLogic doesn’t have to give you heartburn! We have tools that make it easy and fast - and you can even Hadoop your load for extreme performance. Jane Chen will show you how to load data very easily through a GUI tool (Information Studio) or very fast using the command-line mlcp (MarkLogic Content Pump). Jane will also give you a sneak-peek at what she's working on for a future version of mlcp.
